name: Predictive_Bias_Disparity_Ratio
definition: Measures the ratio of false positive rates between different protected demographic groups in predictive policing models to comply with EU AI Act Article 10(2).

calculation_logic.abstract: The ratio of the False Positive Rate (FPR) of the demographic group with the highest error rate compared to the demographic group with the lowest error rate.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT MAX(fpr) / NULLIF(MIN(fpr), 0) FROM (SELECT demographic_group, (SUM(CASE WHEN prediction = 1 AND actual = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN actual = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0)) as fpr FROM model_evaluation_logs GROUP BY demographic_group)

name: Human_Oversight_Intervention_Rate
definition: The percentage of AI-generated law enforcement recommendations that were reviewed and either confirmed or overridden by a human officer, as per Article 14.

calculation_logic.abstract: Count of incidents with a documented human 'override' or 'approval' status divided by total AI recommendations.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN human_review_status IN ('Approved', 'Overridden') THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) FROM ai_decision_audit_trail

name: Model_Accuracy_Drift_Score
definition: Tracks the deviation of model precision over time in biometric identification systems to ensure reliability requirements of Article 15.

calculation_logic.abstract: Difference between baseline precision (at training) and current window precision.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT (baseline_precision - current_precision) FROM model_performance_metrics WHERE model_type = 'Biometric_ID' ORDER BY evaluation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1
